property.name: isReadOnly
property.label: Read Only?
property.description: Are all items in the calendar locked and read only?

property.name: period
property.label: "month" or "week"?
property.description: What is the initial display: month or week?

property.name: leftColumnMonth
property.label: Display left column in month view?
property.description: Display the week numbers on the left of the month view?

property.name: leftColumnWeek
property.label: Display left column of a week with a scale?
property.description: Display the times on the left of the week view along with scale lines?

property.name: leftColumnDay
property.label: Display left column of a day with a scale?
property.description: Display the times on the left of the day view along with scale lines?

property.name: stackedWeek
property.label: Stacking for order and size of week items?
property.description: Use a simplified positioning for week items as in a stack?

property.name: stackedDay
property.label: Stacking for order and size of day items?
property.description: Use a simplified positioning for day items as in a stack?

property.name: partHeightFixedMonth
property.label: Fixed height of monthly items?
property.description: Is the height of the items in a monthly view (which is always stacked) fixed or does it depend on the text?

property.name: partHeightFixedWeek
property.label: Fixed height of weekly items?
property.description: Is the height of the items in a weekly, stacked view fixed or does it depend on the text?

property.name: heightFixedMonth
property.label: Fixed height of monthly calendar?
property.description: Is the height of the calendar in a monthly view fixed?

property.name: heightFixedWeek
property.label: Fixed height of weekly calendar?
property.description: Is the height of the calendar in a weekly view fixed?

property.name: heightFixedDay
property.label: Fixed height of day calendar?
property.description: Is the height of the calendar in a day view fixed?

property.name: startHour
property.label: Default start time of an item
property.description: When does a new or moved event start per default (0-23)?

property.name: scheduler
property.label: Render as Scheduler?
property.description: Render the calendar in the style of a Salesforce Scheduler calendar, i.e. with buttons?
